name: Abolish
oracle_text: You may discard a Plains card rather than pay Abolish's mana cost.
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: As war raged on, the young mages became more direct in their tactics, often at great cost.

name: Aura Fracture
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: Jamuraa's rhystic mages treat magic as their garden, uprooting unwanted spells as bothersome weeds.

name: Avatar of Hope
oracle_text: If you have 3 or less life, Avatar of Hope costs {6} less to cast.
Flying
Avatar of Hope can block any number of creatures.

name: Blessed Wind
oracle_text: Target player's life total becomes 20.
flavor_text:
"The fourth wind of ascension is Anointer, deifying the worthy."
—Keld Triumphant

name: Celestial Convergence
oracle_text: Celestial Convergence enters the battlefield with seven omen counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, remove an omen counter from Celestial Convergence. If there are no omen counters on Celestial Convergence, the player with the highest life total wins the game. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, the game is a draw.

name: Diving Griffin
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text:
To outrace the griffin
—Kipamu expression meaning
"to do the impossible"

name: Entangler
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can block any number of creatures.
flavor_text: "Tell me again," said Latulla, raising her fist, "how just one woman held back an entire Keldon platoon."

name: Excise
oracle_text: Exile target attacking creature unless its controller pays {X}.
flavor_text:
"Creation is no great feat. Anything you make, I can unmake in a heartbeat."
—Alexi, zephyr mage

name: Flowering Field
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn."
flavor_text: Some lands are soothing, and their peace can be felt in the soul.

name: Glittering Lion
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion.
{3}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lion loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lion." Any player may activate this ability.

name: Glittering Lynx
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx.
{2}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lynx loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx." Any player may activate this ability.

name: Jeweled Spirit
oracle_text: Flying
Sacrifice two lands: Jeweled Spirit gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: As he knows all the world completely, the world refuses him harm.

name: Mageta the Lion
oracle_text: {2}{W}{W}, {T}, Discard two cards: Destroy all creatures except for Mageta the Lion. Those creatures can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: In the jungle of war there is always a Lion.

name: Mageta's Boon
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
flavor_text:
When the Lion roars, his cubs grow stronger.
—Kipamu saying

name: Mercenary Informer
oracle_text: Mercenary Informer can't be the target of black spells or abilities from black sources.
{2}{W}: Put target nontoken Mercenary on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: The problem with rebels is that they so quickly reject authority.

name: Mine Bearer
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Mine Bearer: Destroy target attacking creature.
flavor_text: "The Keldons may have explosive tempers, but I have explosives."

name: Mirror Strike
oracle_text: All combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn by target unblocked creature is dealt to its controller instead.
flavor_text:
"Enemies can be your weapons or your shields. Simply show them which they are."
—The Teachings of Zho

name: Reveille Squad
oracle_text: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, if Reveille Squad is untapped, you may untap all creatures you control.
flavor_text: "To arms! To arms! The Lion roars!"

name: Rhystic Circle
oracle_text: {1}: Any player may pay {1}. If no one does, the next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor_text: The circle buys time—an important commodity in battle.

name: Rhystic Shield
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn. They get an additional +0/+2 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
flavor_text: A shield for one is good. A shield for everyone is even better.

name: Samite Sanctuary
oracle_text: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text:
Our war is against suffering, not against those who cause it.
—Samite creed

name: Sheltering Prayers
oracle_text: Basic lands each player controls have shroud as long as that player controls three or fewer lands. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text: "It matters not if the gods hear my prayers. Jamuraa does."

name: Shield Dancer
oracle_text: {2}{W}: The next time target attacking creature would deal combat damage to Shield Dancer this turn, that creature deals that damage to itself instead.
flavor_text: The harder your strike, the stronger her defense.

name: Soul Charmer
oracle_text: Whenever Soul Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, you gain 2 life unless that creature's controller pays {2}.
flavor_text: She seeks the warmth of the living.

name: Sword Dancer
oracle_text: {W}{W}: Target attacking creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Most soldiers think of the sword as a weapon. In the hands of Zho monks, swords are also the strongest of shields.

name: Trenching Steed
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Trenching Steed gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Keldons took several of the steeds as trophies of war. They'd never seen such a light beast stand so firm.

name: Troubled Healer
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
flavor_text: "Which is worse: nothing to defend, or no one to defend it?"

name: Alexi, Zephyr Mage
oracle_text: {X}{U}, {T}, Discard two cards: Return X target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: The Keldons didn't know her name, but they still cursed her in battle.

name: Alexi's Cloak
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"Doesn't look like much, does it?"
—Alexi, zephyr mage

name: Avatar of Will
oracle_text: If an opponent has no cards in hand, Avatar of Will costs {6} less to cast.
Flying

name: Coastal Hornclaw
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Coastal Hornclaw gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Jamuraan farmers fear three things above all else: droughts, floods, and hornclaws.

name: Denying Wind
oracle_text: Search target player's library for up to seven cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
flavor_text:
"The third wind of ascension is Eliminator, clearing Keld's path to victory."
—Keld Triumphant

name: Excavation
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text:
"There are secrets out there begging to be rediscovered. We just need to look in the right places."
—Teferi, planeswalker

name: Foil
oracle_text: You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay Foil's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

name: Gulf Squid
oracle_text: When Gulf Squid enters the battlefield, tap all lands target player controls.
flavor_text: If it could capture the power it wastes, it would be invincible.

name: Hazy Homunculus
oracle_text: Hazy Homunculus can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an untapped land.
flavor_text: They hide in dreams and whispers and faraway thoughts.

name: Heightened Awareness
oracle_text: As Heightened Awareness enters the battlefield, discard your hand.
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
flavor_text:
"It startles me how alive one feels on the edge of death."
—Barrin, master wizard

name: Mana Vapors
oracle_text: Lands target player controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.
flavor_text: The scent of magic can rob you of your senses, blinding you to the world.

name: Overburden
oracle_text: Whenever a player puts a nontoken creature onto the battlefield, that player returns a land he or she controls to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: The Kipamu League knew what Keld refused to acknowledge: the land could support no more.

name: Psychic Theft
oracle_text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. At the beginning of the next end step, if you haven't cast the card, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Quicksilver Wall
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{4}: Return Quicksilver Wall to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text: "Ogg hit wall. Ogg no kill wall. Ogg hate wall!"

name: Rethink
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.
flavor_text: "Are you sure you want to do that?"

name: Rhystic Deluge
oracle_text: {U}: Tap target creature unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor_text:
"I'll rain down on you with the power of magic itself. Then we'll see who prevails."
—Alexi, zephyr mage

name: Rhystic Scrying
oracle_text: Draw three cards. Then, if any player pays {2}, discard three cards.
flavor_text:
"The trick is to ask when no one's listening."
—Alexi, zephyr mage

name: Rhystic Study
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.
flavor_text: Friends teach what you want to know. Enemies teach what you need to know.

name: Ribbon Snake
oracle_text: Flying
{2}: Ribbon Snake loses flying until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text: All snakes slither. Only this one soars.

name: Shrouded Serpent
oracle_text: Whenever Shrouded Serpent attacks, defending player may pay {4}. If he or she doesn't, Shrouded Serpent can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Many travelers have wandered into a fog only to find that it had teeth, claws, and an appetite.

name: Spiketail Drake
oracle_text: Flying
Sacrifice Spiketail Drake: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: "The spell will have to wait," said Alexi, pointing up. "Drakes."

name: Spiketail Hatchling
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Sacrifice Spiketail Hatchling: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor_text: It dodges waves of water to prepare for waves of magic.

name: Stormwatch Eagle
oracle_text: Flying
Sacrifice a land: Return Stormwatch Eagle to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: When eagles leave the sky, sailors leave the sea.

name: Sunken Field
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}."
flavor_text: The land is heavy with promise, the harvest ripe with betrayal.

name: Troublesome Spirit
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your end step, tap all lands you control.
flavor_text: As erratic and turbulent as a summer squall.

name: Windscouter
oracle_text: Flying
When Windscouter attacks or blocks, return it to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
flavor_text: These nimble ships were designed for hit-and-run tactics.

name: Withdraw
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Then return another target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor_text: "We outnumber them! Charge! Charge! Hey, where'd you guys go? Retreat! Retreat!"

name: Agent of Shauku
oracle_text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a land: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Go ahead. Take it. You'll be so very powerful . . . and what harm can it do?"

name: Avatar of Woe
oracle_text: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to cast.
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Bog Elemental
oracle_text: Protection from white
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Bog Elemental unless you sacrifice a land.
flavor_text:
"When the bog walks, the wise run."
—Erissa, bog witch

name: Bog Glider
oracle_text: Flying
{T}, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Chilling Apparition
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Chilling Apparition.
Whenever Chilling Apparition deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
flavor_text: Mortal minds shrivel at its touch.

name: Coffin Puppets
oracle_text: Sacrifice two lands: Return Coffin Puppets from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if you control a Swamp.
flavor_text: The ground won't accept them.

name: Death Charmer
oracle_text: Whenever Death Charmer deals combat damage to a creature, that creature's controller loses 2 life unless he or she pays {2}.
flavor_text: It vents the chill of the grave.

name: Despoil
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Nothing could grow where the vile smoke had been, and no one could breathe it and live.

name: Endbringer's Revel
oracle_text: {4}: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Any player may activate this ability but only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: First death. Then Shauku.

name: Fen Stalker
oracle_text: Fen Stalker has fear as long as you control no untapped lands. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
flavor_text: As silent as a shadow, and just as hard to flee.

name: Flay
oracle_text: Target player discards a card at random. Then that player discards another card at random unless he or she pays {1}.
flavor_text: The Keldons would never admit it, but Greel unsettles them, too.

name: Greel, Mind Raker
oracle_text: {X}{B}, {T}, Discard two cards: Target player discards X cards at random.
flavor_text: "You're Latulla's gift to me, and I always play with my presents."

name: Greel's Caress
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
flavor_text: Greel's grin is far less loathsome than his touch.

name: Infernal Genesis
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Then he or she creates X 1/1 black Minion creature tokens, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

name: Nakaya Shade
oracle_text: {B}: Nakaya Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
flavor_text: Made strong by reckless magic. Made horrid by reckless strife.

name: Noxious Field
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to each creature and each player."
flavor_text: Ultimately, it became a three-way battle: the land attacked both armies.

name: Outbreak
oracle_text: You may discard a Swamp card rather than pay Outbreak's mana cost.
Choose a creature type. All creatures of that type get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: This plague chooses its victims.

name: Pit Raptor
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Pit Raptor unless you pay {2}{B}{B}.

name: Plague Fiend
oracle_text: Whenever Plague Fiend deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text: As the strange plague ravaged Jamuraa, the fiends multiplied.

name: Plague Wind
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"The second wind of ascension is Reaver, slaying the unworthy."
—Keld Triumphant

name: Rebel Informer
oracle_text: Rebel Informer can't be the target of white spells or abilities from white sources.
{3}: Put target nontoken Rebel on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: The problem with mercenaries is that if you can buy their loyalty, others can too.

name: Rhystic Syphon
oracle_text: Unless target player pays {3}, he or she loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.
flavor_text: Jamuraan wizards are linked together by magic, a bond that only the wicked dare exploit.

name: Rhystic Tutor
oracle_text: Unless any player pays {2}, search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Any lock can be undone, any secret revealed.

name: Soul Strings
oracle_text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand unless any player pays {X}.
flavor_text: Everyone is manipulated. It's just more obvious with the dead.

name: Steal Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: With each grunt of pain from Haddad, Greel's grin widened.

name: Wall of Vipers
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Destroy Wall of Vipers and target creature it's blocking. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text:
What wall can never be climbed, but is always scaled?
—Nakaya riddle

name: Whipstitched Zombie
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Whipstitched Zombie unless you pay {B}.
flavor_text: Pity the tailor.

name: Avatar of Fury
oracle_text: If an opponent controls seven or more lands, Avatar of Fury costs {6} less to cast.
Flying
{R}: Avatar of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Barbed Field
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
flavor_text: Wherever they went, the Keldons transformed the land into a weapon.

name: Branded Brawlers
oracle_text: Branded Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land.
Branded Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.
flavor_text:
"The sword or the lash. Choose."
—Akul, Keldon whip sergeant

name: Brutal Suppression
oracle_text: Activated abilities of nontoken Rebels cost an additional "Sacrifice a land" to activate.
flavor_text:
"They no longer care about their own suffering. Show them something worse."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Citadel of Pain
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's end step, Citadel of Pain deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of untapped lands he or she controls.
flavor_text:
"Battle is our religion. This fortress is our temple."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Devastate
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Devastate deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text:
"You're willing to die for your homeland. I'm willing to kill for it."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Fault Riders
oracle_text: Sacrifice a land: Fault Riders gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor_text: They turn geological upheaval into tactical advantage.

name: Fickle Efreet
oracle_text: Whenever Fickle Efreet attacks or blocks, flip a coin at end of combat. If you lose the flip, an opponent gains control of Fickle Efreet.
flavor_text: Flame chooses its own course.

name: Flameshot
oracle_text: You may discard a Mountain card rather than pay Flameshot's mana cost.
Flameshot deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

name: Inflame
oracle_text: Inflame deals 2 damage to each creature dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: Wound, maim, kill: it's all the same to a Keldon.

name: Keldon Arsonist
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice two lands: Destroy target land.
flavor_text:
"Fields can be replanted. Settlements can be rebuilt. Burn it all."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Keldon Berserker
oracle_text: Whenever Keldon Berserker attacks, if you control no untapped lands, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: They fight beyond thought, beyond fear, and beyond mercy.

name: Keldon Firebombers
oracle_text: When Keldon Firebombers enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices all lands he or she controls except for three.
flavor_text:
"If there isn't enough of Jamuraa left to stand on, I will still claim it for Keld."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Latulla, Keldon Overseer
oracle_text: {X}{R}, {T}, Discard two cards: Latulla, Keldon Overseer deals X damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text:
"Everything around her suffers."
—Haddad, Kipamu soldier

name: Latulla's Orders
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to defending player, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.

name: Lesser Gargadon
oracle_text: Whenever Lesser Gargadon attacks or blocks, sacrifice a land.
flavor_text:
Trod on by a gargadon
—Kipamu expression meaning
"wiped out"

name: Panic Attack
oracle_text: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Sometimes everyone decides to go for help at the same time.

name: Rhystic Lightning
oracle_text: Rhystic Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature or player unless that creature's controller or that player pays {2}. If he or she does, Rhystic Lightning deals 2 damage to the creature or player.

name: Ridgeline Rager
oracle_text: {R}: Ridgeline Rager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: While armies battled across Jamuraa, beasts stalked the high places looking for victims.

name: Scoria Cat
oracle_text: Scoria Cat gets +3/+3 as long as you control no untapped lands.
flavor_text: Like a volcano, it too can erupt without warning.

name: Search for Survivors
oracle_text: Reorder your graveyard at random. An opponent chooses a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, exile it.
flavor_text: There's no rest for a Keldon.

name: Searing Wind
oracle_text: Searing Wind deals 10 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text:
"The first wind of ascension is Forger, burning away impurity."
—Keld Triumphant

name: Spur Grappler
oracle_text: Spur Grappler gets +2/+1 as long as you control no untapped lands.
flavor_text: Grapplers hunt in packs, driving their victims over steep mountain cliffs.

name: Task Mage Assembly
oracle_text: When there are no creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice Task Mage Assembly.
{2}: Task Mage Assembly deals 1 damage to target creature. Any player may activate this ability but only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.

name: Veteran Brawlers
oracle_text: Veteran Brawlers can't attack if defending player controls an untapped land.
Veteran Brawlers can't block if you control an untapped land.
flavor_text: Death awaits them on both fronts.

name: Whip Sergeant
oracle_text: {R}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack this turn.)
flavor_text: Keldon soldiers learn to move faster than the whip.

name: Zerapa Minotaur
oracle_text: First strike
{2}: Zerapa Minotaur loses first strike until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text: There's no difference between bone and crystal when it's piercing your throat.

name: Avatar of Might
oracle_text: If an opponent controls at least four more creatures than you, Avatar of Might costs {6} less to cast.
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)

name: Calming Verse
oracle_text: Destroy all enchantments you don't control. Then, if you control an untapped land, destroy all enchantments you control.
flavor_text: The chattering forest fell silent as the otherworldly song began.

name: Darba
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Darba unless you pay {G}{G}.
flavor_text: Legend has it the darba gave up its wings in return for an extra stomach.

name: Dual Nature
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.
Whenever a nontoken creature leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens with the same name as that creature.
When Dual Nature leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with Dual Nature.

name: Elephant Resurgence
oracle_text: Each player creates a green Elephant creature token. Those creatures have "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard."

name: Forgotten Harvest
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a land card from your graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Jolrael, Empress of Beasts
oracle_text: {2}{G}, {T}, Discard two cards: All lands target player controls become 3/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
flavor_text: "I need no army. I have Jamuraa."

name: Jolrael's Favor
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
{1}{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"War destroys; nature renews."
—Jolrael, empress of beasts

name: Living Terrain
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.
flavor_text: Keldons were accustomed to rugged terrain, but they never expected it to be aggressive.

name: Marsh Boa
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Though a powerful constrictor, it prefers simply to drown its prey.

name: Mungha Wurm
oracle_text: You can't untap more than one land during your untap step.
flavor_text: Cities have crumbled under its weight.

name: Pygmy Razorback
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text: As a rite of passage, Kipamu youths taunt razorbacks with long sticks . . . then flee.

name: Rib Cage Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Everything it sees it considers food—and with that many eyes, it's not liable to miss much.

name: Root Cage
oracle_text: Mercenaries don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
flavor_text: The Vintara Forest welcomes its enemies with a crushing embrace.

name: Silt Crawler
oracle_text: When Silt Crawler enters the battlefield, tap all lands you control.
flavor_text: If they could replenish the land instead of draining it, Jamuraa would be teeming with them.

name: Snag
oracle_text: You may discard a Forest card rather than pay Snag's mana cost.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by unblocked creatures this turn.

name: Spitting Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Sacrifice a land: Spitting Spider deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

name: Spore Frog
oracle_text: Sacrifice Spore Frog: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text: The end of one life is merely the beginning of thousands more.

name: Squirrel Wrangler
oracle_text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Create two 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens.
{1}{G}, Sacrifice a land: Squirrel creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Gnawed to death. Bad way to go."

name: Thresher Beast
oracle_text: Whenever Thresher Beast becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a land.
flavor_text: It destroys everything in its path, including the path itself.

name: Thrive
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target creatures.
flavor_text: "We wait and watch, and as we prepare for war, we grow strong."

name: Verdant Field
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
flavor_text: Jolrael tends the land so that the land will tend the beasts.

name: Vintara Elephant
oracle_text: Trample
{3}: Vintara Elephant loses trample until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.
flavor_text: Trained with the aid of rhystic magic, they become uneasy in its absence.

name: Vintara Snapper
oracle_text: Vintara Snapper has shroud as long as you control no untapped lands. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"The snapper is still when all else moves
And strikes when all are dozing."
—Tales of the Vintara Forest

name: Vitalizing Wind
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +7/+7 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The fifth wind of ascension is Exalter, fulfilling Keld's destiny."
—Keld Triumphant

name: Wild Might
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. That creature gets an additional +4/+4 until end of turn unless any player pays {2}.
flavor_text: The hunted can become the fiercest hunters.

name: Wing Storm
oracle_text: Wing Storm deals damage to each player equal to twice the number of creatures with flying that player controls.
flavor_text: A thousand wings beating as one can choke the sky itself.

name: Chimeric Idol
oracle_text: {0}: Tap all lands you control. Chimeric Idol becomes a 3/3 Turtle artifact creature until end of turn.
flavor_text: After a chimeric idol attacked them, the Keldons smashed all unfamiliar statues.

name: Copper-Leaf Angel
oracle_text: Flying
{T}, Sacrifice X lands: Put X +1/+1 counters on Copper-Leaf Angel.
flavor_text:
"When Serra made angels, people called her a goddess. My angels are far superior to hers."
—Latulla, Keldon overseer

name: Hollow Warrior
oracle_text: Hollow Warrior can't attack or block unless you tap an untapped creature you control not declared as an attacking or blocking creature this combat. (This cost is paid as attackers or blockers are declared.)
flavor_text: Though it moves like a living thing, anyone can tell it lacks a soul—not to mention mercy.

name: Keldon Battlewagon
oracle_text: Trample
Keldon Battlewagon can't block.
When Keldon Battlewagon attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
Tap an untapped creature you control: Keldon Battlewagon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the power of the creature tapped this way.

name: Well of Discovery
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control no untapped lands, draw a card.
flavor_text:
When you have given everything, then you are capable of anything.
—Well inscription

name: Well of Life
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control no untapped lands, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
When you have given everything, then you have everything to gain.
—Well inscription

name: Rhystic Cave
oracle_text: {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color to your mana pool unless any player pays {1}. Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant.
flavor_text:
"All mages dip into the same well; some are just in more of a hurry."
—Alexi, zephyr mage

name: Wintermoon Mesa
oracle_text: Wintermoon Mesa enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wintermoon Mesa: Tap two target lands.
flavor_text:
Dark is light and day is night
When the winter moon shines.
